HEADING: Tenant Created
SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your tenant has been created successfully!
NEXT_STEPS_INTRO: You might want to take some common steps to continue setup:
NEXT_STEP_3: Grab the Tenant ID (available on the API/SSO info page) for integrations.
TENANTS_VIEW_LINK_TEXT: This can be done by going back to the tenants view and switching to the tenant.
TENANT_SWITCHING_INFO: All actions to managed tenants are done via tenant switching, including deleting the tenant if needed.
